subject: Hockey, Ice
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: Earlier this season, the thought of making his third straight appearance as a finalist for the Vezina Trophy as the N.H.L.’s best goalie was the furthest thing from Henrik Lundqvist’s mind.
snippet: Earlier this season, the thought of making his third straight appearance as a finalist for the Vezina Trophy as the N.H.L.’s best goalie was the furthest thing from Henrik Lundqvist’s mind.
